question: Swaraj party was outcome of which among the following incidents?
explanation: The Swaraj Party was formed on 9 January 1923 after the Gaya annual conference in 1922. Chittaranjan Das was the president and Motilal Nehru was the secretary of the organization. The organization was formed in opposition with Gandhiji's suspension of Non-Cooperation movement on 5 February 1922 after the Chauri Chaura incident.
